movies.title: Samson and Sally
movies.plot: Samson is a young whale that doesn't have friends. He spends his time listening to his mother's stories about the legendary whale Moby Dick. Samson becomes fascinated about it and decides to go on a journey to find Moby Dick.
movies.simplePlot: Samson is a young whale that doesn't have friends. He spends his time listening to his mother's stories about the legendary whale Moby Dick. Samson becomes fascinated about it and decides to go on a journey to find Moby Dick.

biography.bio: Jesper Klein was born on November 13, 1944 in Næstved, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Jungle Jack (1993), Beauty and the Beast (1983) and Samson and Sally (1984). He was married to Lykke Nielsen. He died on August 22, 2011 in Frederiksberg, Denmark.
biography.name: Jesper Klein

biography.bio: Helle Hertz was born on October 29, 1943 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. She is an actress, known for Rene hjerter (2006), Sorrow and Joy (2013) and Samson and Sally (1984).
biography.name: Helle Hertz

biography.bio: Per Pallesen was born on April 30, 1942 in Aars, Denmark as Per Aabye Pallesen. He is an actor and director, known for Helmer & Son (2006), Dansk naturgas (1981) and Pallesen Pilmark Show (1984). He has been married to Vivian Dencker since April 23, 2011. He was previously married to Kirsten Peüliche.
biography.name: Per Pallesen

biography.bio: Bodil Udsen was born on January 12, 1925 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), Send More Candy (2001) and Fear Me Not (2008). She died on February 26, 2008 in Copenhagen.
biography.name: Bodil Udsen

biography.bio: Poul Thomsen was born on February 15, 1922 in Præstø, Denmark as Johannes Poul Thomsen. He was an actor, known for Den forsvundne fuldmægtig (1971), Samson and Sally (1984) and Hvad er det nu den hedder? (1984). He died on December 16, 1988 in Denmark.
biography.name: Poul Thomsen

biography.bio: An actress and a director, Kirsten Peüliche has achived much acclaim for her work through what is now two decades of theatre and film. One of her first noticed performances was in the stage cabaret show "Byens bedste bryster" in the mid-eighties, a show which has been continued in several new versions since then. As a director for the stage she has won acclaim for the Danish version of the popular play "The Vagina Monologues" (2001). Her latest project is 2004's play based on Proust's "In Search of Lost Time" at Århus Teater. She has also taught theatre classes at Statens Teaterskole, Denmark. It is fair to say, though, that Peüliche's widest audiences were reached in her acting roles in film and television, especially her comedic part as one of the elves in Nissebanden (1984) and Nissebanden i Grønland (1989).
biography.name: Kirsten Peüliche

biography.bio: Berthe Qvistgaard was born on August 11, 1910 in Denmark. She was an actress, known for Buster's World (1984), Hold fingrene fra mor (1951) and Vores fjerde far (1951). She died on October 24, 1999 in Denmark.
biography.name: Berthe Qvistgaard

biography.bio: Claus Ryskjær was born on June 26, 1945 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for What's Wrong with This Picture (2004), The Boy Who Wanted to Be a Bear (2002) and Huset på Christianshavn (1970). He was married to Elisabeth Rasmussen and Jane Thomsen. He died on December 12, 2016 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
biography.name: Claus Ryskjær

biography.bio: Preben Neergaard was born on May 2, 1920 in Denmark. He was an actor and director, known for People Meet and Sweet Music Fills the Heart (1967), Manden der tænkte ting (1969) and Kristinus Bergman (1948). He died on July 22, 1990 in Frederiksberg, Denmark.
biography.name: Preben Neergaard

biography.bio: Ole Ernst graduated from Odense Teater in 1967 where shortly afterwards he was hired as a stage-actor. Ernst had his debut playing Chino in Westside Story (1965). In 1969 he jumped from Odense Teater to Det Kongelige Teater where he continued stage-acting until 1976. Ernst performed in a lot of classic stage-plays such as Jeppe På Bjerget, Erasmus Montanus, Hamlet and Amadeus. In 1973, Ernst played the lead role in Hans Kristensen's gangster-movie Flugten which was followed by the two sequels Per (1975) and Blind Makker (1976). The three films became very popular, and are to this day still considered some of the best Danish films ever. Kristensen's Per-trilogy launched Ole Ernst's career as one of the finest actors of his generation. A short list of other great films Ernst starred in: Hærværk (1977), Terror (1977), Mord I Mørket (1986), Peter von Scholten (1987), Epidemic (1987), Sort Høst (1993), Okay (2002) and Rembrandt (2004). In 1994, Ole Ernst was re-hired by Det Kongelige Teater.
biography.name: Ole Ernst

biography.bio: Staffan Hallerstam was born on May 21, 1957 in Stockholm, Sweden as Alf Gunnar Staffan Hallerstam. He is an actor, known for Pippi in the South Seas (1970), Pippi Longstocking (1969) and Karlsson on the Roof (1974). He is married to Ann-Marie Hallerstam. They have two children.
biography.name: Staffan Hallerstam

biography.bio: Mathias Henrikson was born on May 16, 1940 in Bromma, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Claes Anders Mattias Henriksson. He was an actor, known for My Love and I (1964), System 84 (1978) and Tueur d'état (1998). He died on July 13, 2005 in St Görans sjukhus, Stockholm.
biography.name: Mathias Henrikson

biography.bio: Heinz Hopf was born on November 11, 1934 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He was an actor, known for Thriller: A Cruel Picture (1973), Fanny and Alexander (1982) and Diary of a Rape (1971). He died on January 23, 2001.
biography.name: Heinz Hopf

biography.bio: Ingvar Kjellson was born on May 20, 1923 in Kärna, Östergötlands län, Sweden as Anders Ingvar Kjell. He was an actor, known for Shame (1968), The Last Gasp (1995) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991). He was married to Meta Velander. He died on December 18, 2014 in Djursholm, Stockholms län, Sweden.
biography.name: Ingvar Kjellson

biography.bio: Louise Ræder was born on April 9, 1962 in Farsta, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Children of Noisy Village (1986), More About the Children of Noisy Village (1987) and Spanska flugan (1983).
biography.name: Louise Ræder
